crazyovenman Then why the fuck you clicked on this you retard? It's obvious from the cover and tags what kind of hentai this is Or are you too retarded to look at them first?

This Us A Great Sci-fi,Horror Plot I've Ever Seen
Brain Eater, the gift that never stops giving.
nice catch Troncol, thanks for sharing. ALSO, that whatever the fuck hybrid, tilted the living shit outta me lol, such imagination...

So the Policewoman (in first pages he was giving instruction to survivors to take shelter inside the school prior to her attack) from the previous work (Brain Eater 3), you can see her new form (the main bug in this title) and her dead body with the open cicada shell on her back in page 36. Turning her into some kind of bug hybrid that takes in some features of their host/victim. Now we know that certain "brain eaters", through a process, can transform this is the answer. I think....
japan being weird again this is fucked up
They are having ecstacy while their brain is being sucked out at least much better experience than in "Night of the Living Dead"
